name: Spider Solitaire Classic ◆
description:
The best Spider Solitaire game you'll ever play! Fully featured with classic intuitive gameplay and beautifully decorated themes for a unique Spider Solitaire experience. Endless fun and puzzles await. What are you waiting for? Download and try it out now!

Recognized as one of the most popular card games in the world, Spider Solitaire (also known as Spiderette or Spiderwort) is great to play while relaxing at home, on your commute to work, on the plane, or anywhere offline. Play on your iPhone or iPad, both support portrait and landscape modes!

With unlimited winning deals, you'll never run out of interesting games to keep your brain challenged.

Track your progression and game stats to beat your own times and scores. Weave your way from a novice beginner to a Spider Solitaire master (with the help of some Hints and Auto-Moves)!

Enjoy fun, stimulating visuals while exercising your brain! Includes:
• 40+ colorful, various HD themes and backgrounds
• Customizable card backs with photos from your gallery
• Quick and easy gameplay with over 10,000 winnable games
• Play with 1, 2, or 4 suits
• Portrait & Landscape mode available
• Hints, Auto-Move, Semi-Move, and Undo's
• Improve your scores by tracking your progress with Stats
• Simple designs available for relaxing gameplay

Be sure to check back again for updates on new features, theme packs, and more! For fast and creepy crawly support, email us at contact@maplemedia.io. We'd love to hear from you.
